feed.title: Category: choosing first venues | A Woman's Journey Through Technology

entry.title: NorWesCon
entry.content: So, back to the plan to renew that passion and prepare for my reentry into the workforce. This spring, I went to our local annual literary convention and attended several panels about women in STEM (science, technology, engineering, math) and women networking with women. Most of my social connections previously have been with men, so networking with women was a bit frightening. But, I needed to get out more and freshen my networking skills as a preparation for interviewing so I plunged forward. I chose a couple of venues to start with.
